content.body: Exactly, this is the main blocker for the proposal. I couldn’t get agreement to cache unfrozen template strings arrays, and TS is the biggest hurdle because it’s always unfrozen.

So you're saying that this proposal cannot proceed with its strategy because there will be too many people depending on TS5.9 because they target ES5, but who want to use a polyfill or target a modern runtime?

* So you're saying that this proposal cannot proceed with its strategy because there will be too many people depending on TS5.9 because they target ES5, but who want to use a polyfill or target a modern runtime with `String.dedent`?
content.formatted_body: * So you're saying that this proposal cannot proceed with its strategy because there will be too many people depending on TS5.9 because they target ES5, but who want to use a polyfill or target a modern runtime with String.dedent?
